title: Calvin Ridley Suspension, Rodgers Stays in Green Bay
itunes:title: Calvin Ridley Suspension, Rodgers Stays in Green Bay
description:
The NFL suspends Atlanta Falcons wideout Calvin Ridley for gambling, Aaron Rodgers will stay to play in Green Bay, and the Washington Capitals condemns Russia's invasion of Ukraine. Michael Barr and Mike Lynch discuss all that and more on this Wednesday edition of Bloomberg Business of Sports.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
